thread.title: 5 things to know, and free hoagies, airlines in cahoots (?) and Lohan's heinie
thread.title_full: 5 things to know, and free hoagies, airlines in cahoots (?) and Lohan's heinie

author: Dell Poncet
title: 5 things to know, and free hoagies, airlines in cahoots (?) and Lohan's heinie
text:
See All Homes of the Day If you’re like me, some of the best times of your life are spent in airports, on planes and dealing with airline personnel. So it’s disturbing to hear that the U.S. Justice Department is investigating to see if airlines are colluding to keep fares high. If Justice determines that airlines are operated by anything other than pastel unicorns and rose-scented bunnies, I will be shocked! Shocked, I tell you! So put back your seat into the face of the passenger behind you, eat your overpriced plastic food and read what Alison Burdo has to say about it. Gone like that This is one of those stories that is more interesting if you are in the local media in some way than in other industries. Star Group Communications of Voorhees, N.J., went out of business after 30 years, surprising folks in the media. Its claim to fame, other than being based in Voorhees (or as I like to think of it: Cherry Hill's younger brother) is that it was the largest female-owned marketing agency in the nation. Fran "Not for Long" Hilario provides the lowdown . It's good to make a deal Being a high-flying executive for a corporation takes a lot of skill and determination. You have to work hard, make tough decisions and put in a lot of hours. Along with that, if you succeed comes financial remuneration. The executives of BB&T Corp. are reaping the rewards of its acquisition of Susquehanna Bancshares. Jeff Blumenthal reports on their fatter wallets. Free hoagies! Wawa Welcome America is doing its annual part to feed the hungry in celebration of the adoption of the Declaration of Independence by declaring a free hoagie zone . Get in on the goodies at Independence Mall. Apple or Spotify, which one for you? If you are an Apple person like me (there are other kinds of people too, apparently) you are ready to try out Apple Music . But if you already like Spotify is Apple Music the thing for you? Here is some advice about finding the best soundtrack of your life. Facebook's look Facebook , this social media thing you might have heard of if you are younger than a stegosaurus, undertook a massive, huge, gargantuan change that probably took them months of careful deliberation and heated debate and probably cost large bags of money. Facebook changed its logo . If you didn't notice you are likely not alone. Enjoy your long weekend. If you are one of the unlucky people who have to work, know that we appreciate you. I'm going to spend my time following the escapades of the man who could be our next president, and marvel at how the more people run from him in terror, the more organizations and networks and companies spurn his loving glances, the more haircolorists shake their heads in wonder ... his poll numbers rise. God bless America.
